text: "Never Be the Same Again" is a 2000 song by Melanie C featuring Lisa Lopes from TLC. It is the third single from her debut studio album Northern Star. It went to number 1 in the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Scotland, Sweden and the United Kingdom, number 2 in Australia and Romania, number 3 in Austria, Iceland, Ireland and Switzerland, number 4 in Belgium, Denmark and Hungary, number 5 in Germany, number 6 in Czech Republic and Italy, number 7 in Greece, number 8 in Croatia and Finland and number 16 in France. ==Track listings== * UK CD1 and Australian CD single # "Never Be the Same Again" # "I Wonder What It Would Be Like" # "Never Be the Same Again" # "Never Be the Same Again" * UK CD2 # "Never Be the Same Again" # "Closer" # "Goin' Down" * UK cassette single # "Never Be the Same Again" # "I Wonder What It Would Be Like" # "Never Be the Same Again" * European CD single # "Never Be the Same Again" # "I Wonder What It Would Be Like" ==References== Category:2000 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Melanie C songs
